title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Narrative Biblical Text Exploration: VR-Based Deep Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the conflict-crisis-resolution structure of biblical stories in VR simulation environments and derive theological implications
Participants can produce project-based modern application plans for biblical texts according to the five-stage narrative structure (conflict, complication, clue, climax, implication)
Learners can develop creative cases that connect biblical interpretation to practical problem-solving through peer feedback and instructor coaching.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
